name: the lost fleet
description:
A space based real time strategy game with first person shooter style missions.

You command a fleet of civilian and military spacecraft who are stranded in a solar system far from home and without the resources to get there.

your mission is to explore the planets of the solar system to gain resources such as fuel, material and manpower. The planets you travel to are enemy controlled and you will be met with resistance.

The aim of the game is to travel through the galaxy collecting resources to make "faster than light" jumps from system to system in order to reach your home.
